form.instruction:
Run the file excltest.txt through your morphological parser and then run the syntactic parser on the output. Check the log for the results and note any changes you need to make to the lexicon or to answers about the order of elements in the phrase structure rules. Make the changes as needed and rerun.
Congratulations! You have now completed the starter kit. Save the PC-PATR grammar file (.grm) and the grammar writeup (.xml) with a different name before editing. Contact Cheri_Black@sil.org for help on how to proceed or how to handle specific constructions. Feedback on how to improve this starter kit would also be appreciated.
